title: What could be the most shocking outcome of the 2020 US presidential election? - Quora
tags: Political Campaigns in the United States of America

response.answer_text: The most shocking outcome I can think of is the following, but realize this isn’t a wish; it’s just a shocking scenario: As President Trump recovers from COVID-19, Joe Biden contracts the virus. He’s in the high-risk group and he dies from it. The “never Trump” people wonder: “Why did we select somebody so old? Kamala Harris tries very hard in public to not look elated at the prospect of becoming president. People complain that they want to change the vote they mailed in, because they say that now that it’s Trump vs Harris, they’d rather change their vote of Biden and Harris to one of Trump and Pence. They are told “nothing can be done about it.” Kamala Harris chooses AOC to be her vice-president. SJWs spontaneously begin having multiple orgasms at the very thought of Harris/AOC winning the election. The other side reacts in their own way: Every gun in every store in the country is sold over the next few days. Survival gear and books are sold in astonishing numbers. People wonder how Biden got the virus when he had been so incredibly cautious. Something just doesn’t seem right. Then one morning newspaper headlines read: “AOC implicated in intentionally infecting Biden”! Holy shit! It turns out AOC is sick with the virus! There is some evidence she may have gotten herself intentionally infected just after passing a test for COVID-19. Allegedly, she had a friend who was sick with it give it to her so she could then infect the much older Joe Biden. When questioned, AOC says: “I won’ t dignify that deplorable lie with a reply. “ Tensions across the country skyrocket. In Chicago, a militia group annihilates a group of almost 70 people who were looting and burning stores, wiping them out with their massive arsenal of guns. One member of the militia is interviewed and states: “We’re just doing what the Democrat mayor either wouldn’t or couldn’t! The days of Law and Order are back! Can you feel it in the air”? Kamala Harris is asked about the Chicago incident and says: “Those virulently toxic males have strengthened my anti-firearm convictions. If the people elect me I will ensure that America becomes a country where guns are outlawed - anyone who doesn’t hand all their guns over the government will be considered an outlaw.” AOC, miraculously recovered, joins here at a rally where she declares: Although we are Democrats, we prefer to be referred to as the “Reparation Party.” Election day is chaos as fanatics on both sides pick fights with anyone who doesn’t look like they think the same way politically as they do. Early polls show Democrats leading Republicans by a slight margin. Then the tide turns and Republicans start voting en masse. Pence says that this turnaround is as if it’s “The Hand Of God - first striking down Biden and now inspiring Republicans to vote in numbers that shatter all previous records”! A around 11:30 PM on election night, news networks around the country say that a definite winner can now be declared. The winners are: Donald Trump and Mike Pence!
